00049 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00050 void DRDYB_EXTI_Configuration(void);
00051 void ADC_MainRoutine(void);
00052 
00053 /* Global variables ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00054 s32 sADCValue;
00055 
00056 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00057 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00058   * @brief  Main program.
00059   * @retval None
00060   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00061 int main(void)
00062 {
00063 
00064   DRDYB_EXTI_Configuration();
00065 
00066   ADC24_Init();
00067   ADC24_Start();
00068 
00069   while (1)
00070   {
00071     ADC_MainRoutine();
00072   }
00073 }
00074 
00075 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00076   * @brief  ADC main routine.
00077   * @retval None
00078   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00079 void ADC_MainRoutine(void)
00080 {
00081   /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00082      The "ADC24_ReadData_MainRoutine()" function shall be called regularly.
00083   */
00084   if (ADC24_ReadData_MainRoutine(&sADCValue))
00085   {
00086     // ADC data is ready, process data here
00087     // ...
00088 
00089     // printf("ADC = %d", sADCValue);
00090     __NOP();
00091   }
00092 }
00093 
00094 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00095   * @brief  EXTI configuration for DRDYB.
00096   * @retval None
00097   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00098 void DRDYB_EXTI_Configuration(void)
00099 {
00100   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00101     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00102     CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO       = 1;
00103     CKCUClock.Bit.EXTI       = 1;
00104     CKCUClock.Bit.HTCFG_DRDYB_GPIO_CK = 1;
00105     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00106   }
00107 
00108   /* Configure AFIO mode of input pins                                                                      */
00109   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_DRDYB_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_DRDYB_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_GPIO);
00110 
00111   /* Enable GPIO Input Function                                                                             */
00112   GPIO_InputConfig(HTCFG_DRDYB_GPIO_PORT, HTCFG_DRDYB_GPIO_PIN, ENABLE);
00113 
00114   /* Configure GPIO pull resistor of input pins                                                             */
00115   GPIO_PullResistorConfig(HTCFG_DRDYB_GPIO_PORT, HTCFG_DRDYB_GPIO_PIN, GPIO_PR_DISABLE);
00116 
00117   /* Select Port as EXTI Trigger Source                                                                     */
00118   AFIO_EXTISourceConfig(HTCFG_DRDYB_AFIO_EXTI_CH, HTCFG_DRDYB_AFIO_ESS);
00119 
00120   { /* Configure EXTI Channel n as falling edge trigger                                                     */
00121 
00122     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00123        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00124        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00125     */
00126     EXTI_InitTypeDef EXTI_InitStruct;
00127 
00128     EXTI_InitStruct.EXTI_Channel = HTCFG_DRDYB_EXTI_CHANNEL;
00129     EXTI_InitStruct.EXTI_Debounce = EXTI_DEBOUNCE_DISABLE;
00130     EXTI_InitStruct.EXTI_DebounceCnt = 0;
00131     EXTI_InitStruct.EXTI_IntType = EXTI_NEGATIVE_EDGE;
00132     EXTI_Init(&EXTI_InitStruct);
00133   }
00134 
00135   /* Enable EXTI & NVIC line Interrupt                                                                      */
00136   EXTI_IntConfig(HTCFG_DRDYB_EXTI_CHANNEL, ENABLE);
00137   NVIC_EnableIRQ(HTCFG_DRDYB_EXTI_IRQn);
00138 }

00147 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)

00151      Debug message can be added here.
00152      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00153   */
00154 
00155   while (1)
00156   {
00157   }
00158 }
